text: Marc Alexander Scheer (born 16 May 1979) is a German sprinter who specializes in the 400 metres. He finished fourth at the 1998 World Junior Championships. In 4 x 400 metres relay he finished fifth at the 1998 World Cup and eighth at the 2001 World Championships. ==References== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:German male sprinters
title: Marc Alexander Scheer
